title: Doki Doki Densetsu: Mahoujin Guru Guru
title_jp: ドキドキ伝説 魔法陣グルグル
synopsis: Join the new legend of Guru Guru, where Nike, the reluctant hero, and Kukuri, the innocent heroine, return to save the world. The magical adventure that unfolds, with its unique monsters and eccentric characters, is sure to draw you into this curious and exciting realm.
